trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when reading, writing to, registering, or accessing in some other way an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error condition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException"></xref> class that provides specific <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref>.
The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
The context, which includes source and destination, of the serialized stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException"></xref> class that provides a specific error condition and includes the cause of the exception.
If the `innerException` parameter is not `null`, the current exception is thrown in a `catch` block that handles the inner exception.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the error condition.
The underlying error that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.XpsPackagingException"></xref>.
